headline: KKR & Co. Inc. to Announce First Quarter 2025 Results
summary: NEW YORK, April 08, 2025--KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE: KKR) announced today that it plans to release its financial results for the first quarter 2025 on Thursday, May 1, 2025, before the opening of trading on the New York Stock Exchange.

headline: Moon Capital Management Q1 2025 Client Letter
summary: So much has happened in the first week of April that much of the data in our normal quarter-end letter is already outdated. Click here to read the full letter.

headline: Tariffs Add New Hurdle To Private Equity's Exit Challenge
summary: The industry entered 2025 with high hopes for improving exit conditions, encouraged by a 5% year-over-year uptick in the number of buyout fund exits in 2024.

raw.headline: Tariffs Add New Hurdle To Private Equity's Exit Challenge
